item.title: Who is the Future Founder and what is this site?
item.description: Greetings, my friend from the world wide web. This website is the result of me failing at publishing online on a regular basis. I often faced many struggles with (old) new publishing technologies, which got in my way of just writing and publishing. That is why I have re-thought the way in which I bring things online. This website makes it easy to just write & publish. No bloated add ons, ads, extension or other things that get in your and my way.
